msg: HBASE-7649 client retry timeout doesn't need to do x2 fallback when going to different server

msg: HBASE-8179. Fixes a problem to do with the json response for the cluster status

author: kstam
msg: JUDDI-573 fixing performance issue while querying for busineses with lots of services. There is no need o re-query each service in this case. This optimization brought the query time down to less then 1 second.
